title: Digital Dignity Check
description: Assess understanding of dignity-preserving platform design

questions.question: What does 'virality as privilege' mean?
options: Only privileged people can go viral
Wide reach must be earned through trust, not just engagement
questions.explanation: Virality as privilege means reach is earned through demonstrated trustworthiness.

questions.question: The Social Medium epic supports 'like' buttons as primary engagement.
questions.explanation: The protocol explicitly avoids low-friction 'likes' in favor of more meaningful engagement.

questions.question: What is 'mediated reaction'?
options: Elohim intercepting potentially harmful reactions with teaching
questions.explanation: Mediated reactions teach rather than block, preserving agency while protecting dignity.
